1.0.name: wordpress/wpfuturecal
1.0.description: Remembering to post every day, and which days you already posted, is super easy with this plugin. It shows you a calendar with days red when there isn't a post, and days green when there is. Green days you can hover over and see the title of the post, and click to edit the post for that day.
